name: Zarya-1: Mystery on the Moon
description: Text based quest, mix of Sci-Fi and horror in the veins of Alien and Dead Space.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Core i3 6100, AMD X4 860 and above (May work on lower specifications) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 650Ti, Radeon HD 5870 (May work on lower specifications) Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Generic
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Core i5-2500, AMD FX-8120 and above (May work on lower specifications) Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 750, Radeon HD 6950 (May work on lower specifications) Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Generic
